CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Feature Access Management
CurrentVersion.description: Admins will have the ability to enable or disable designated Viva Engage features for specific users through the M365 admin center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Feature Access Management
OldVersion.description:
Admins will have the ability to enable or disable designated Viva Engage
features for specific users through the M365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - CMK (Customer Managed Keys) encryption support for data at-rest in Review sets
CurrentVersion.description: ,This release of eDiscovery features the implementation of customer-managed key (CMK) options, allowing users to manage their own encryption keys for the data stored in eDiscovery review sets in addition to the default, strong Microsoft-managed encryption already in place.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - CMK (Customer Managed Keys) encryption support for data at-rest in Review sets
OldVersion.description: ,This release of eDiscovery features the implementation of customer-managed key (CMK) options, allowing users to manage their own encryption keys for the data stored in eDiscovery review sets in addition to the default, strong Microsoft-managed encryption already in place.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: External Guest Sharing
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow users to share whiteboards with external guests of your tenant via a personal share link (PSL). This feature will respect any OneDrive/Sharepoint sharing settings your tenant has enabled. Additionally, if your tenant has Business to Business Invitation Manager (B2B IM) enabled, this feature will allow you to send a whiteboard via PSL to external users and B2B IM will create a guest user account for them so they can access the file.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: External Guest Sharing
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow users to share whiteboards with external guests of your tenant via a personal share link (PSL). This feature will respect any OneDrive/Sharepoint sharing settings your tenant has enabled. Additionally, if your tenant has Business to Business Invitation Manager (B2B IM) enabled, this feature will allow you to send a whiteboard via PSL to external users and B2B IM will create a guest user account for them so they can access the file.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Manage Microsoft Surface Hub as a Teams Rooms on Windows device
CurrentVersion.description: With the transition of Microsoft Surface Hub devices to the Teams Rooms on Windows platform, Admins can now manage Surface Hub devices as Teams Rooms on Windows devices in the Teams Admin Center and Teams Rooms Pro Management (available for Teams Rooms Pro license customers).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Manage Microsoft Surface Hub as a Teams Rooms on Windows device
OldVersion.description:
With the transition
of Microsoft Surface Hub devices to the Teams Rooms on Windows platform, Admins
can now manage Surface Hub devices as Teams Rooms on Windows devices in the
Teams Admin Center and Teams Rooms Pro Management (available for Teams Rooms Pro
license customers).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Keyword highlight support for document trainable classifiers
CurrentVersion.description: Highlight the keywords/phrases that are contributing significantly to the Trainable classifier results, so that users can easily understand the classification of the documents. This would build trust of the users of the OOB classifications and empower them to create DLP policies.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Keyword highlight support for document trainable classifiers
OldVersion.description: Highlight the keywords/phrases that are contributing significantly to the Trainable classifier results, so that users can easily understand the classification of the documents. This would build trust of the users of the OOB classifications and empower them to create DLP policies.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create up to 50 Viva Connections experiences within a tenant
CurrentVersion.description: Customers with Viva suite or Viva Communications and Communities license can create up to 50 distinct Connections experiences for their audience groups. This is currently limited to only 10 experiences.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create up to 50 Viva Connections experiences within a tenant
OldVersion.description: Customers with Viva suite or Viva Communications and Communities license can create up to 50 distinct Connections experiences for their audience groups. This is currently limited to only 10 experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teachers can (manually) update parent data in Parent App
CurrentVersion.description: Allow teachers to add and edit existing parent data inside the Parent app. This request to update parent information can be directly made by teachers inside the Parent app. Once the request is raised, it needs an admin approval before updating the parent information in the app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teachers can (manually) update parent data in Parent App
OldVersion.description: Allow teachers to add and edit existing parent data inside the Parent app. This request to update parent information can be directly made by teachers inside the Parent app. Once the request is raised, it needs an admin approval before updating the parent information in the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags will be supported in Private Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people in private channels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags will be supported in Private Channels
OldVersion.description: Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people in private channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Content camera on New Teams Desktop
CurrentVersion.description: This feature it will be available on new Team Teams on Windows and Mac, making whiteboards, printed documents, books, and other physical objects the focus of your Teams meeting. With minimal setup, you can help meeting attendees who aren’t in the room feel more included and engaged in your next class, demo, or brainstorming session.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Content camera on New Teams Desktop
OldVersion.description: This feature it will be available on new Team Teams on Windows and Mac, making whiteboards, printed documents, books, and other physical objects the focus of your Teams meeting. With minimal setup, you can help meeting attendees who aren’t in the room feel more included and engaged in your next class, demo, or brainstorming session.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: A single desktop app for all user types
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams on Windows and Mac will support every type of Teams account (work, school or personal) in a single desktop application.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: A single desktop app for all user types
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams on Windows and Mac will support every type of Teams account (work, school or personal) in a single desktop application.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Open Teams app content in multi-window stageview
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams enables you to open your app content in new multi-window experiences. Unlock multi-tasking workflows for your users inside Teams. Allow them to engage with content and conversation, side-by-side.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Open Teams app content in multi-window stageview
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams enables you to open your app content in new multi-window experiences. Unlock multi-tasking workflows for your users inside Teams. Allow them to engage with content and conversation, side-by-side.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Use Apple AirPods to mute/unmute yourself in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams now works seamlessly with Apple AirPods to mute or unmute yourself on Mac models running macOS Sonoma. The same functionality already available on iPhone running iOS 17 is now supported on new Teams for Mac.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Use Apple AirPods to mute/unmute yourself in Microsoft Teams
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams now works seamlessly with Apple AirPods to mute or unmute yourself on Mac models running macOS Sonoma. The same functionality already available on iPhone running iOS 17 is now supported on new Teams for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: macOS Platform SSO Support
CurrentVersion.description: ,Enable logging in on a managed Mac using your Entra ID password.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Update: We began rolling out this feature out, in late March, ahead of the previously scheduled time. We apologize for any inconvenience. Display topic highlights and access topic cards in Yammer conversations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics in Viva Engage
OldVersion.description: ,Update: We began rolling out this feature out, in late March, ahead of the previously scheduled time. We apologize for any inconvenience. Display topic highlights and access topic cards in Yammer conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Custom result types in Microsoft Search
CurrentVersion.description: New support for custom result types allows you to create result types with modern display templates with adaptive cards for SharePoint content (PDF, sites, pages and lists) for SharePoint home and sites, Office.com and Bing.com.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Search: Custom result types in Microsoft Search
OldVersion.description: New support for custom result types allows you to create result types with modern display templates with adaptive cards for SharePoint content (PDF, sites, pages and lists) for SharePoint home and sites, Office.com and Bing.com.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Automatic chapters for Teams meeting recordings from PowerPoint Live sharing
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, chapters will automatically be created for your Teams meeting recording when you share your slides during the meeting with PowerPoint Live. This will help meeting recording viewers easily find the right part of the meeting to watch based on when slides are presented. This feature is part of Teams Premium.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Automatic chapters for Teams meeting recordings from PowerPoint Live sharing
OldVersion.description: With this feature, chapters will automatically be created for your Teams meeting recording when you share your slides during the meeting with PowerPoint Live. This will help meeting recording viewers easily find the right part of the meeting to watch based on when slides are presented. This feature is part of Teams Premium.
